title: Calculate CAKE’s Q2-FY2025 end-of-period comparable restaurant base for The Cheesecake Factory segment. Assume none of the restaurants opened over the last six quarters were closed. Express your answer as a whole number.
description:
1. Recognize CAKE's comparable restaurants convention. "Restaurants enter comps in their 19th month of operation; relocated and closed restaurants are excluded from comps. Therefore, EOP comparable base = total reported EOP Q2-FY2025 The Cheesecake Factory restaurants - minus restaurants opened during the last 6 quarters.
 
 2. Identify EOP The Cheesecake Factory restaurants open at Q2-FY2025: 216 restaurants.
 
 3. Sum The Cheesecake Factory restaurants opened during the last six quarters:
  - Q2-FY2025: 2; Q1-FY2025: 0; Q4-FY2024: 2; Q3-FY2024: 0; Q2-FY2024: 1; Q1-FY2024: 0
 
 Total openings = 5 restaurants. 
 
 4. EOP comparable restaurant base for The Cheesecake Factory segment: 216 − 5 = 211 restaurants.

rubric.criteria: Recognize that restaurants enter comps in their 19th month of operation.
Recognize from the assumptions that closed restaurants are excluded from comps.
Reported EOP The Cheesecake Factory restaurants at Q2-FY2025 = 216
Identify restaurants opened in Q1-FY2025 as = 0
Identify restaurants opened in Q4-FY2024 as = 2
Identify restaurants opened in Q3-FY2024 as = 0
Identify restaurants opened in Q2-FY2024 as = 1
Total restaurants opened in the last six quarters = 5
Calculated end-of-period comparable restaurant base for The Cheesecake Factory at Q2-FY2025 = 211
